thread.title: 10 Bodybuilders You Need To Follow On Instagram If You Want To Make Gains
thread.title_full: 10 Bodybuilders You Need To Follow On Instagram If You Want To Make Gains

title: 10 Bodybuilders You Need To Follow On Instagram If You Want To Make Gains
text:
Askmen India > Health & Sports > Fitness & Workouts > 10 Bodybuilders You Need To Follow On Instagram If You Want To Make Gains 10 Bodybuilders You Need To Follow On Instagram If You Want To Make Gains 'Cause Who Doesn't Love Some Good Ol' Motivation Right? Lindsay Tigar   
Even if resolutions aren’t exactly your thing--and definitely not something you brag about on Instagram, if you post at all--the first month of the year is often a time when most people start to think about their life, their choices and their goals. 
If last year you mostly ate healthy, managed to squeeze in some gym time a few days a week and still get at least some shut-eye, you might be wondering how you’ll up the ante this year with your workout game. 
To get your inspiration juices flowing, might we suggest making your endless scrolling ritual a bit more effective. Instead of double-tapping on the Sports Illustrated models you shamelessly follow, try filling your feed with dedicated bodybuilders and gym rats who know how to do more than pump iron: they do it to make a living. 
In addition to offering advice, sharing some killer videos that’ll make you wonder how they managed to pull off that move and some not-too-difficult protein shakes and meal prep ideas, these viral bodybuilders have turned their hobby into a lifestyle you can imitate. 
Or at the very least, visualise a goal for the future of your body that you put so much energy, sweat and ahem, money into. 
Here are 10 epic bodybuilders you have to follow on Instagram now:
